description: Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.

translations.description: Протоколира речеви фрази във файл. Може също така да протоколира речта от отдалечена сесия на NVDA от добавката NVDA Remote в същия или друг файл. По избор включва речта от функцията "прочитане на всичко".

Protokolliert die Sprachausgabenmeldungen in einer Datei, sobald der Benutzer eine Taste betätigt hat. Kann auch die Sprachausgabe von NVDA der Remote-Sitzungen aus der NVDA-Erweiterung NVDA-Remote in dieselbe oder eine andere Datei protokollieren lassen. Optional wird auch die Funktion Alles Lesen über die Sprachausgabe erfasst.

Registra mensajes de voz en un archivo después de que el usuario pulse un atajo de teclado. También puede registrar la voz de una sesión remota del complemento NVDA Remote al mismo o a otro archivo. Incluye opcionalmente la voz del modo verbalizar todo.

Tallentaa puhekatkelmat tiedostoon, kun käyttäjä painaa tallennuksen aloittavaa näppäinkomentoa. Voi tallentaa myös NVDA:n etäistunnon puheen NVDA-etäkäyttö-lisäosasta samaan tai eri tiedostoon. Sisältää valinnaisesti jatkuvan luvun puheen.

Enregistre les messages de la parole dans un fichier, après que l'utilisateur a appuyé sur une touche de lancement. Vous pouvez également enregistrer la parole d'une session distante NVDA à partir de l'extension NVDA Remote, dans le même fichier ou un autre. Inclut éventuellement la parole Dire tout.

Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.

Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.

Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.

Regista as expressões de voz num ficheiro, depois de o utilizador premir uma tecla de início. Também pode registar o discurso da sessão remota do NVDA a partir do suplemento NVDA Remote, no mesmo ou noutro ficheiro. Opcionalmente, inclui o discurso do say-all.

Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.

Записывает речевые высказывания в файл после того, как пользователь нажмет клавишу запуска. Также можно записывать речь удаленного сеанса NVDA из дополнения NVDA Remote в тот же или другой файл. Дополнительно включает запись речи в режиме полного воспроизведения.

Kullanıcı bir başlatma tuşuna bastıktan sonra konuşma ifadelerini bir dosyaya kaydeder. NVDA Remote eklentisinden gelen NVDA uzak oturum konuşmasını da aynı veya başka bir dosyaya kaydedebilir. İsteğe bağlı olarak Tümünü seslendir'den gelen konuşmayı da içerir.

Logs speech utterances to a file, after the user presses an initiating key. Can also log NVDA remote session speech from the NVDA Remote add-on, to the same or another file. Optionally includes speech from say-all.
